snippet.title: Why Domestic Violence Victims Don't Leave // Why It's Hard to Leave Abusive Relationship
snippet.description:
Leaving a domestic violence/abusive relationship situation is so much harder than many people realize. Here is where I break it down.
To learn more, watch this playlist on Trauma Bonds: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB_3Za7PqWnT0bfle8XDtPiydKzvRgMSb

Reactive Abuse: https://youtu.be/IwN9aGUHLX4

ARTICLE LINK: https://ncadv.org/why-do-victims-stay

Subscribe for more abusive relationship recovery: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOZ0I68vkpjU80psv9eKozQ?sub_confirmation=1

Share this video with a friend:
https://youtu.be/1w0QQq5iUk8

Watch next – https://www.tubebuddy.com/quicknav/latest/UCOZ0I68vkpjU80psv9eKozQ

Recommended Playlist – START HERE to learn where to focus on your healing journey.
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB_3Za7PqWnRHJTS1GXUpaSnGBmWxatKd

CHAPTERS:
00:00 - Why didn't they just leave?
00:55 - The Victim Knows the Abuser Best
02:03 - Abuser Stereotype
02:50 - Study Data
03:20 - Barriers to Leaving a violent relationship
06:20 - You Know a Victim
06:40 - Societal Barriers to Leaving a Toxic Relationship
10:10 - You are Not a Failure


Let’s connect:

Instagram – www.instagram.com/karleigh.lynne

Twitter – twitter.com/karleigh_lynne

TikTok – https://www.tiktok.com/@karleighlynne

LinkedIn – https://www.linkedin.com/in/karleighlynne/

FREE CONFIDENCE COURSE FOR SURVIVORS
www.karleighlynne.com/confidence

WANT YOUR OWN WORTHY SWEATER?!
Check out my clothing line here: www.karleighlynne.com/shop

Karleigh Saunders is an abuse recovery coach, speaker, educator, and professional hype woman. She is the founder of Worthy and host of the Confidence from the Ground Up Podcast. Check it out here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/confidence-from-the-ground-up/id1506436208 

Karleigh provides education and support to women who have survived abusive relationships through educational videos on YouTube, daily tips on Instagram and twice a week on the podcast. She also provides coaching and accountability with Worthy, her group coaching membership for female survivors.

Disclaimer: all opinions are my own. This information is not meant to be used to diagnose or provide treatment of any kind. All information is for education and entertainment purposes only.
